“Competing in the 21st Century: Navigating the Global Marketplace”

March 8, 2013
The U.S. Department of Commerce’s International Trade Administration, along with the Economic Development Administration, the Minority Business Development Agency, and a number of strategic regional partners, has developed a series of no cost, one day, international opportunities seminars. These seminars are taking place on the campuses of U.S. minority serving institutions across the country. The program includes keynote speakers, panel discussions, and valuable networking opportunities with representatives from government, industry, academia, and regional international trade associations. <!-- TRANSIT - HYPERLINK --><!-- ./main/mes/eg_main_022034. -->About the Series <!-- TRANSIT - HYPERLINK --><!-- ./main/mes/eg_main_022035. -->Program Agenda <!-- TRANSIT - HYPERLINK --><!-- ./main/mes/eg_main_022037. -->Seminar Schedule <!-- TRANSIT - HYPERLINK --><!-- ./main/mes/eg_main_022036. -->Featured Speakers Register Now If you are a minority serving institution interested in participating in the seminar series, please contact <!-- TRANSIT - HYPERLINK --><!-- .mailto:Shawn.Ricks@trade.gov. -->Shawn.Ricks@trade.gov for additional information. <!--SS_END_OPENREGIONMARKER(region1)--> <!--SS_BEGIN_CLOSEREGIONMARKER(region1)--> <!--SS_END_CLOSEREGIONMARKER(region1)--> <!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment11,Presentation)--><!-- Code Added to have buyusa home pages move to export.gov --><!-- New Code Ended --><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment11,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment16,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment16,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment15,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment15,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment18,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment18,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment19,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment19,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_OPENREGIONMARKER(region2)--><!--SS_END_OPENREGIONMARKER(region2)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(region2_element1,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(region2_element1,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(region2_element2,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(region2_element2,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_CLOSEREGIONMARKER(region2)--><!--SS_END_CLOSEREGIONMARKER(region2)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment17,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment17,Presentation)-->
